definition: If one can change after making a mistake, there is nothing better (idiom)
pinyin: guo4 er2 neng2 gai3 , shan4 mo4 da4 yan1

definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect
